    Automate your sales over WhatsApp and receive payments 24/7.

    Boost your revenues with conversational sales

    Increase sales

    Increase both engagement and effectiveness by reaching your customers where they are with personalized messages and providing an always-on service.

    Reduce costs

    Handle more customers' requests with less resources by automating repetitive tasks. You trim costs while improving conversion, thereby increasing your ROI.

    Streamline your helpdesk

    With automated FAQs, your customer service reps can focus on high-value conversations and tasks. A conversation is handed over to a rep only when needed.

    Our flasghip product is an intelligent agent that helps businesses engage with their customers and sell tickets over WhatsApp.

    Autonomous Ticketing

    The agent can connect to our backend to automate tickets' purchases and mobile money payment processings. We provide you with a dashboard to keep track of your sales and reach out to your customers with promotions and marketing material.

    Automated FAQs

    The agent responds to your active customers even when your customer service agents are not available. It monitors all incoming requests from WhatsApp and attend to custmers's inquiries in real-time, 24/7. A log of all the interactions is available for you to review.

    Use cases

    • Sales
      Increase sales with personalized messages. A simple, fast and automated sales channel to bring total convenience to your customers.
    • Customer Service
      90% of customer conversations can be automated. Attend to your customers even outside working hours. Hand more complex queries to a human support agent automatically.
    • Marketing
      Personalized messaging campaigns are 12x more effective than email for re-marketing. Send promotions to your most valuable customers directly on WhatsApp.

    Bringing conversational sales to the ticketing industry

    Events

    For events organizers. Free events always remain free. Payments processing charges + Service charges for paid events.

    Entertainment

    For cinema, night clubs, concerts, etc. Saada is the seamless way for your customers to get their tickets.

    Transportation

    For bus companies, airlines and rail. Allow your customers to book their next trips from the comfort of their favorite messaging app.

    How It Works

    See why Saada is the easiest way to sell tickets.

    Create

    Create your event, experience or trip with our easy to use dashboard and go live in a matter of minutes.

    Share

    Shared your allocated WhatsApp number and link, and promote them on your social media.

    Get Paid

    Your customers are guided through the process and pay with mobile money without exiting WhatsApp.

    Monitor

    Just relax, and see all the bookings coming through on your dashboard, along with associated payments.

    Check

    A digital ticket with a unique code is issued for each purchase; just verify that it reflects on your side.

    Engage

    Reach out to your customers with personalized messages and promotions.
